title: Greek Dance Night - Ζεϊμπέκικο και Ρεμπέτικο
description: Join us for a night of Greek dance and music where we share how to dance the traditional Greek dance Ζεϊμπέκικο (Zey-BE-kiko) all to the rhythm of the Greek music of Ρεμπέτικο (Re-BE-tiko)!

title: Από οι θεοί αρχαίοι σε Χριστός - How religion shaped the Greek culture, past and present
description: Join us for a discussion on how religion shaped the Greek culture, past and present. We will discuss the ancient Greek gods and how they influenced the culture, as well as the impact of Christianity on modern Greek society.

title: Το Αλφαβητάρι - The Greek Alphabet
description: Join us for a fun and interactive session on the Greek alphabet! We will learn the letters, their sounds, and how to write them. This is a great opportunity to get familiar with the Greek language.

title: Start of Summer Break!
description: The summer break is here! Enjoy your time off and make the most of it!

title: Potential Trip to Greece
description: We are considering a trip to Greece! Stay tuned for more details.
location: Virtual. Zoom link will be sent out to all members.
